path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - NemoSwap Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: A01.Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens?
findings.description: The program allows minting an unlimited number of sundae tokens due to incorrect token_mint_a verification.

findings.title: A02.Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows an unauthorized user to upgrade scripts.

findings.title: Unsafe UncheckedAccount for token_mint_a
findings.description: The initialize_pool.rs function uses an UncheckedAccount for token_mint_a which can lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: initialize_2_pools_with_native_mint
findings.description: The program allows native mint to be the base in a pair and does not check if token_mint_a pub key is less than token_mint_b pub key, enabling the addition of 2 pools for a pair by swapping tokens.
